aircraft.value: Hydra Advanced - AC-9960-708 at Zone-1 Facility

defect_observed.value: Canopy seal deterioration. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 19/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 21/09/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 24/09/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 26/09/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 29/09/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma
